title: Navaratna Kundanalu: Auspicious Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Navaratna gemstones (Ruby
features: Classic stud design featuring a vibrant array of Navaratna gemstones, traditionally believed to bring good fortune and balance. The openwork gold setting, embellished with diamonds, adds a delicate and modern touch to this traditional piece. The setting allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies (puja). These earrings can also add a touch of elegance to modern attire
making them suitable for parties and celebrations.
description: Experience the timeless allure of South Indian tradition with these exquisite Navaratna Kundanalu. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and color, representing the nine planets and their auspicious energies. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a lustrous finish, ensuring a lasting shine. These earrings are not just jewelry; they are a symbol of prosperity and well-being.
